name: Solar Racers!
description:
Run against the top racers in the world, using your top-of-the-line solar car!

Complete 5 laps before you run out of power! Accelerating, shooting and nitro use power. Stay in the sun light spots to recharge if needed!

UP: accelerate

DOWN: break

LEFT: steer left

RIGHT: steer right

A: nitro

S: shoot

Done using GODOT
